metadata.title: CVE-2018-13098 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in fs/f2fs/inode.c in the Linux kernel through4.17.3. A denial of service (slab out-of-bounds read and BUG) can occur fora modified f2fs filesystem image in which FI_EXTRA_ATTR is set in an inode.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needed ESM criteria').
